subject: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail owner!
We sent you this letter a month ago, but I haven't heard from you, I'm not sure you received it, so I'll say it again: First of all, I'm Ms. Kristalina Georgieva, Executive Director and President of The International Monetary Fund (IMF)
The president and governing body of the United Nations Monetary Union asked us to investigate long-standing uncollected funds in the UN government basket, which left the owners confused that they had been duped by fraudsters using the UN name. During our investigation, according to the data storage records of our system, your payment with your e-mail address is included in the list of 150 recipients, which can be classified into the following categories: Undelivered lottery fund / Lottery unpaid fund / Incomplete inheritance fund transfer / contracts.
We are shocked to learn that your payment has been unnecessarily delayed by corrupt bank officials in an attempt to defraud your coffers, leading to so much loss from your end and unnecessary delay in the arrival of your payment. The United Nations and the International Monetary Fund (IMF) have decided to pay all compensation to 150 beneficiaries from North America, South America, the United States, Europe and Asia and around the world through ATM Visa Card, as it is a global payment technology that enables consumers, businesses, financial institutions and governments to use digital currency instead of cash and checks.
We have arranged the payment via ATM Visa card issued in your name and sent directly to your address via DHL or any courier service available in your country. Once you contact us, $1,500,000.00 will be credited to your ATM Visa card, allowing you to withdraw money from any ATM in your country, with a minimum of $10,000 per day. Upon request, the limit can be increased to $20,000.00 per day.
In this regard, 
you should contact the International Payments and Remittances Directorate as follows and provide the necessary information;
1. Your full name (first and last name)
2. Your full address and country
3. Nationality
4. Date of birth / gender
5. Occupation
6. Telephone/fax number
7. Your company e-mail address / personal e-mail address.
Use this code (Ref: CLIENT-601) as the subject of your email address for identification and try to provide the above information to the authorities below for ATM Visa card issuance and delivery; 
The Agent is advised to open a private email address with a new number so that we can track this payment and communicate with the transfer to avoid further delay or misdirection of the fund.
Please contact Kristalina Georgieva directly regarding your compensation fund. (United Bank ATM VISA CARD)
Contact email: ( 
mrskristalina053@gmail.com
 )
To avoid further delays, we request your urgent response to this email as instructed.
Regards
Ms Kristalina Georgieva, Public Information Officer. INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
Dear Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my funds. I apologize if there was any confusion or delay in my response. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that my payment is processed and delivered to me safely.

I have a few questions before proceeding with providing the necessary information. Firstly, could you please clarify how the ATM Visa card works? Will I be able to use it like a regular debit card? Are there any fees associated with using the card?

Secondly, I would like to know more about the security measures in place for this transaction. How can I be assured that my personal and financial information will be kept confidential and protected?

Lastly, could you provide some additional details about the Payments Agent who will be handling this process? What is their role and how can I contact them directly?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
Dear beneficiary,

 Thanks for your time to get in touch with the office Mrs kristalina
georgieva, We are very sorry for the late reply to your email address,

The U.S. Department of the Treasury and some other relevant Investigation
Agencies here in the United States of America. has ordered our Foreign
Payment

Remittance Agent, Mrs kristalina georgieva to issue you an ATM VISA Card,
where your fund $1.500, 000.00 USD  will be uploaded, for further
withdrawing of your fund.  And oday we notify, you that your fund has been
credited into VISA Card ready to be deliver, to you at your home address,
please send your informations below ðŸ‘‡

Send her the following information for the delivery of your accredited ATM
VISA Card to your home address.

Your Full Name====================
Your Country of Origin===============
Your City Name: ====================
Your Home address =================
Your gender======================
Your profession=====================
Your phone number =================
A copy of your ID: ===========
Postcode =========================

Thanks for your kind attention.

Regards
MRS.KRISTALINA GEORGIEVA, , PUBLIC INFORMATION OFFICER.INTERNATIONAL
MONETARY FUND.

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
Dear Mrs. Kristalina Georgieva,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize for the delay in my response. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the Department of the Treasury and other relevant agencies in the United States.

I am interested in learning more about this ATM VISA Card and how it can help with the remittance of funds. Could you please provide me with some additional details? For example, what is the process for receiving and activating the card? Are there any fees or charges associated with it?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the security measures in place to protect my personal information and ensure a safe delivery of the card to my home address. Can you please elaborate on these aspects?

Thank you again for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
This Visa ATM card can be used worldwide in both your country's currency
and your country's currency and you need to pay the shipping costs for DHL
delivery company service to deliver it to you immediately after the
presentation of the shipment. It only costs $690 with just insurance
coverage for the card.

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information about the Visa ATM card. It sounds interesting. Could you please provide me with more details about how this card works? How can I use it worldwide in both my country's currency and another currency?

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
This means you can withdraw with the ATM Visa card at any ATM machine in
the world.

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds quite convenient to be able to withdraw money from any ATM machine worldwide using a Visa card. Could you please provide me with more details about how this works? Are there any fees or limitations associated with using this card?

Best wishes,
Christopher

body:

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Dear Fund Beneficiary e-mail o
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information with me. However, I have a few questions before I can provide you with the details you're asking for. Could you please clarify what this accredited ATM VISA Card is for? Additionally, why do you need my personal information such as my full name, country of origin, home address, gender, profession, phone number, and postcode? I just want to make sure I understand the purpose behind these requests. Thank you!

Best wishes,
Christopher

body:

card to your home Address
